titles.title: A resolution honoring the Detroit Shock on winning the 2006 Women's National Basketball Association Championship.
A resolution honoring the Detroit Shock on winning the 2006 Women's National Basketball Association Championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Congratulates the Detroit Shock on winning the 2006 Women's National Basketball Association Championship.
